title: BFPL Vineyard
description: Waterfront Wine Tasting Event at Brookfield Place. Celebrate summer by exploring a selection of wines on the waterfront during BFPL Vineyard, an exclusive wine tasting event at Brookfield Place. Connoisseurs and enthusiasts alike can indulge in a delightful experience that includes expertly curated wines, complimentary light bites, and waterfront views. Each $50 ticket provides a reservation for a party of two (2 individuals). Note that you must be 21+ to attend.
